name: 2024 5th International Conference on Electronic Engineering and Signal Processing
content: PUBLICATION: Submissions will be reviewed by the conference technical committees, and accepted papers will be included in EESP 2024 Conference Proceedings, published by IEEE Conference Publishing Services (CPS), sent to IEEE Xplore for inclusion, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus.
organizers: University of Derby and The British University in Egypt
